nc.description: x must be greater than or equal to 20

nd.description: x must be in the range [30, 40)

ne.description: x must be outside the range [30, 40)

nf.description: x must be outside the range [30, 40)

ni.description: x must but greater or equal 200 and being optional

nk.description: x must be set to true

nl.description: x cannot be set to true

sb.description: x must be exactly 5 characters long

sc.description: x must be at least 3 characters long

sd.description: x must be between 5 and 10 characters, inclusive

se.description: x must be at most 15 bytes long

sf.description: x must be between 128 and 1024 bytes long

sg.description: x must be a non-empty, case-insensitive hexadecimal string

sj.description: x must contain "baz" anywhere inside it

sk.description: x cannot contain "baz" anywhere inside it

sl.description: x must begin with "fizz" and end with "buzz"

sm.description: x must end with ".proto" and be less than 64 characters

sp.description: x must be a valid email address (via RFC 5322)

sq.description: x must be a valid address (IP or Hostname).

sr.description: x must be a valid hostname (via RFC 1034)

ss.description: x must be a valid IP address (either v4 or v6)

ip4.description:
x must be a valid IPv4 address
eg: "192.168.0.1"

ip6.description:
x must be a valid IPv6 address
eg: "fe80::3"

uri.description: x must be a valid absolute URI (via RFC 3986)

absuri.description: x must be a valid URI reference (either absolute or relative)

uuid.description: x must be a valid UUID (via RFC 4122)

httpheadname.description: x must conform to a well known regex for HTTP header names (via RFC 7230)

httpheadvalue.description: x must conform to a well known regex for HTTP header values (via RFC 7230)

bd.description: x must be at least 3 bytes long

be.description: x must be between 5 and 10 bytes, inclusive

bf.description: x must be a non-empty, ASCII byte sequence

bi.description: x must contain "baz" anywhere inside it

bm.description: x must be a valid IP address (either v4 or v6) in byte format

bn.description:
x must be a valid IPv4 address in byte format
eg: "\xC0\xA8\x00\x01"

bo.description:
x must be a valid IPv6 address in byte format
eg: "\x20\x01\x0D\xB8\x85\xA3\x00\x00\x00\x00\x8A\x2E\x03\x70\x73\x34"

rd.description: x must contain unique int64 values

rk.description: x must contain positive float values

items.description: x must contain Persons but don't validate them

ge.title: Duration

gl.title: Timestamp
gl.description: x must be less than the Unix Epoch

gm.title: Timestamp
gm.description: x must be greater than or equal to 2009/11/10T23:00:00Z

gp.title: Timestamp
gp.description: x must be less than the current timestamp

gq.title: Timestamp
gq.description: x must be within Â±1s of the current time
